dcterms:description: A large-scale dataset containing images with annotations for object detection, segmentation, and captioning tasks. It includes over 300,000 images with 5 captions each, making it suitable for training and evaluating image captioning models.
dcterms:title: MSCOCO

dcterms:description: A dataset containing images with dense annotations for objects, attributes, and relationships. It is used for training models that require understanding of scene context and relationships between objects.
dcterms:title: Visual Genome
